revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Ready.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Well spotted. Looks good.
Submit - Corrected three typing mistakes at l. 78, 168 and 298. I went back to the text of the edition, which fits what is visible on the images of the papyrus
Finalized - This is good to go.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Fine.
Submit - l. 222: corrected typo in ταλάντου. Added omitted l. 223.
Finalized - Ready.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Fine

Βξ ὧν
